feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: EF5008 No special G/L acct defined for acct type D sp.G/L ind. A recon.acct using BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT
entry.content:
Good day 

I have an error that is troubling me, when I use my custom ABAP program to post a Special G/L Down payment(posting key 19 and 40) using BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT it gives me the error below .

E F5 008 No special G/L acct defined for acct type D sp.G/L ind. A recon.acct

But when I post the same details using f-29 the transaction is posted without errors. I have gone over the configuration several times but all seems good.

I have attached my configuration as well.

regards

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Report  ZTEST_AI_CODE2
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ZTEST_AI_CODE2.

data: documentheader   type bapiache09,

      w_obj_type       type bapiache09-obj_type,
      w_obj_key        type bapiache09-obj_key,
      w_obj_sys        type bapiache09-obj_sys,

      w_logsys         type tbdls-logsys,
*"     VALUE(OBJ_TYPE) LIKE  BAPIACHE09-OBJ_TYPE
*"     VALUE(OBJ_KEY) LIKE  BAPIACHE09-OBJ_KEY
*"     VALUE(OBJ_SYS) LIKE  BAPIACHE09-OBJ_SYS

      e_accountgl      like bapiacgl09,
      t_accountgl      type standard table of bapiacgl09,
*"      ACCOUNTRECEIVABLE STRUCTURE  BAPIACAR09 OPTIONAL
      ls_accountpayable type bapiacap09,
      it_accountpayable type standard table of bapiacap09,
*"      ACCOUNTTAX STRUCTURE  BAPIACTX09 OPTIONAL
      it_accounttax type STANDARD TABLE OF BAPIACTX09,

      e_currencyamount type bapiaccr09,
      t_currencyamount type standard table of bapiaccr09,
*"      CRITERIA STRUCTURE  BAPIACKEC9 OPTIONAL
*"      VALUEFIELD STRUCTURE  BAPIACKEV9 OPTIONAL
*"      EXTENSION1 STRUCTURE  BAPIACEXTC OPTIONAL
      e_return         type bapiret2,
      t_return         type standard table of bapiret2,
      it_accountreceivable LIKE TABLE OF bapiacar09,
      ls_accountreceivable TYPE          bapiacar09.
*"      PAYMENTCARD STRUCTURE  BAPIACPC09 OPTIONAL
*"      CONTRACTITEM STRUCTURE  BAPIACCAIT OPTIONAL
*"      EXTENSION2 STRUCTURE  BAPIPAREX OPTIONAL
*"      REALESTATE STRUCTURE  BAPIACRE09 OPTIONAL
DATA: loc_amt              TYPE          wrbtr.
DATA: count type i.

data: itab like alsmex_tabline occurs 0 with header line.

TYPES: Begin of t_record,

    Doc_date like itab-value,
    Doc_type like itab-value,
    Company_code like itab-value,
    Posting_date like itab-value,
    Period like itab-value,
    Currency like itab-value,
    Posting_key like itab-value,
     Posting_key2 like itab-value,
    Account like itab-value,
    Amount like itab-value,
    Tax_code like itab-value,
    Doc_text like itab-value,
    Cost_centre like itab-value,
    End of t_record.


DATA: it_record type standard table of t_record initial size 0,
      wa_record type t_record.
DATA: gd_currentrow type i.



DATA: C_Doc_date like sy-datum,
      C_Posting_date like sy-datum,
      account_num(10) type c,
      cost_centre(10) type c,
      amt type p DECIMALS 2.

  call function 'OWN_LOGICAL_SYSTEM_GET'
    importing
      own_logical_system             = w_logsys
    exceptions
      own_logical_system_not_defined = 1
      others                         = 2.

  if sy-subrc ne 0.
    message id sy-msgid type sy-msgty number sy-msgno
           with sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4.
  endif.

  documentheader-username   = sy-uname.
  documentheader-header_txt = 'BELINAPOSTING'."'THIS IS THE HEADER TEXT'.

* Value field from T022 table, for BAPI, use 'RFBU'
  documentheader-bus_act    = 'RFBU'.

* Company Code
  documentheader-comp_code  = '1000'. "wa_ex-col3."9100.

* Document Date
  documentheader-doc_date   = '20250423'."'20200206'."wa_ex-col1."sy-datum.
* Posting Date
  documentheader-pstng_date = '20250423'."sy-datum."'20200206'."wa_ex-col4."sy-datum.
* Transaction Date (important when we have conversion rates)
  documentheader-trans_date = '20250423'.
* Document Type
  documentheader-doc_type   =  'DZ'."wa_ex-col2."'SA'.
""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

"G/L
"Debit

wa_record-Posting_key = '40'.
"wa_record-Posting_key = '19'.
"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" posting the table transactions"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""CREDIT LEG 19"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""
              ls_accountreceivable-customer  =   '0200000133'. " cust."'0000700397'.  200000133
              "*  ls_accountpayable-gl_account = '0000161000'.
              """""""""""ls_accountreceivable-gl_account = '0000142010'.
              ls_accountreceivable-comp_code = '1000'."gs_ZBELINA_sap-zcompcode.
              "*ls_accountreceivable-pmnttrms = '0001'.
              ls_accountreceivable-bline_date = '20250423'. "gs_ZBELINA_sap-baseline_date.
              "*ls_accountreceivable-pymt_meth = 'E'.
              "ls_accountreceivable-PYMT_CUR       = 'USD'.
            " ls_accountreceivable-sp_gl_ind = 'A'.

              "ls_accountpayable-tax_code  = 'A0'.

              ls_accountreceivable-item_text  = 'A/cc Receivable'. "gs_ZBELINA_sap-zdoc_text_ref."'BELINA Test A/P l item'.

               ls_accountreceivable-ITEMNO_ACC  = '002'. "gs_ZBELINA_sap-zdoc_text_ref."'BELINA Test A/P l item'.
               "#EC NOTEXT

               ls_accountreceivable-SP_GL_IND = 'A'.
              APPEND ls_accountreceivable TO it_accountreceivable.

              """ fill_currencyamount.

              CLEAR: loc_amt.

              CLEAR: e_currencyamount,loc_amt.
              "***  loc_amt = <lsy_output>-betrw.
              e_currencyamount-itemno_acc   = '002'. ""count.
              "ls_currencyamount-curr_type    = '00'.
              e_currencyamount-currency     = 'USD'."gs_ZBELINA_SAP-ZCURRENCY."'USD'.
              e_currencyamount-amt_doccur   = -110 . "'-2.00'. " amt  ."
              "***  ls_currencyamount-amt_base   =  '10.00'. "" loc_amt. ""( For  Debit / ‘S’)

              APPEND e_currencyamount TO t_currencyamount.
"=======================================================================================================================================================


"==============================================Debit Leg 40====================================================================================================
"IF gs_ZBELINA-zpost_key EQ '40'.
          "iteeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee   40 oz"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""
        "  count = count + 1.
          e_accountgl-itemno_acc      = '001'.   "count."1."rlv_counter.

          e_accountgl-comp_code       = '1000'.  "gs_ZBELINA-zcompcode."w_postings-company.

          e_accountgl-gl_account      = '0000113802'. "account_num."wa_record-Account."'0000403172'."w_postings-account.

          e_accountgl-pstng_date      = '20250423'   .  "gs_ZBELINA-zpost_date. " C_Posting_date."'20200206'."sy-datum."w_header-pstng_date.
          "e_accountgl-cs_trans_t      = "w_postings-ttype.

          e_accountgl-item_text       = 'A/c gl'.  "   gs_ZBELINA-zdoc_text_ref."'back 4 the 1st time'."w_postings-description.

           "e_accountgl-waers        = 'USD'.

         " e_accountgl-tax_code  = 'A0'.

          APPEND e_accountgl  TO t_accountgl.

          CLEAR e_accountgl.

          CLEAR: e_currencyamount,loc_amt.
              "***  loc_amt = <lsy_output>-betrw.
          e_currencyamount-itemno_acc   = '001'. ""count.
              "ls_currencyamount-curr_type    = '00'.
          e_currencyamount-currency     = 'USD'."gs_ZBELINA_SAP-ZCURRENCY."'USD'.

          e_currencyamount-amt_doccur   = '110' ."'2.00'. " amt * ( -1 ) ."
              "***  ls_currencyamount-amt_base   =  '10.00'. "" loc_amt. ""( For  Debit / ‘S’)

          APPEND e_currencyamount TO t_currencyamount.




"ENDIF.






  CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST'
**    destination dest
    EXPORTING
      documentheader = documentheader
***      customercpd       = gd_customercpd
***      contractheader    = gd_fica_hd
    TABLES
      accountgl      = t_accountgl
      accountreceivable = it_accountreceivable
      accountpayable = it_accountpayable
      accounttax     = it_accounttax
      currencyamount = t_currencyamount
   "  criteria       = it_criteria
   "  valuefield     = it_valuefield
   "  extension1     = it_ext
      return         = t_return.
  "paymentcard       = it_paymentcard
  " contractitem      = it_fica_it.
*      extension2        = it_ext2
*      realestate        = it_re.

**********************
* Calling UP BAPI FM *
**********************
*ENDLOOP.

*  call function 'BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST'
*    exporting
*      documentheader          = documentheader
**       CUSTOMERCPD             =
**       CONTRACTHEADER          =
*    importing
*      obj_type                = w_obj_type
*      obj_key                 = w_obj_key
*      obj_sys                 = w_obj_sys
*    tables
*      accountgl               = t_accountgl
*       ACCOUNTRECEIVABLE       = it_accountreceivable
*       ACCOUNTPAYABLE          = it_accountpayable
**       ACCOUNTTAX              =
*      currencyamount          = t_currencyamount
**       CRITERIA                =
**       VALUEFIELD              =
**       EXTENSION1              =
*      return                  = t_return
**       PAYMENTCARD             =
**       CONTRACTITEM            =
**       EXTENSION2              =
**       REALESTATE              =
*            .

  call function 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
    exporting
      wait          = 'X'
*     IMPORTING
*       RETURN        =
            .

  loop at t_return into e_return.

    if  e_return-type   eq 'S'
    and e_return-id     eq 'RW'
    and e_return-number eq 605.

      write: /01 e_return-type,
              03 e_return-id,
              10 e_return-number,
              15 'Document Released ',
              40 w_obj_type, w_obj_key, w_obj_sys.

    else.

      write: /01 e_return-type,
              03 e_return-id,
              10 e_return-number,
              15 e_return-message.

    endif.

  endloop.
    "endif.

entry.title: Including @OData.publish:true on v4 OData service.
entry.content:
I have created 2 Odata services which I intend to use one on Fiori app, and the other one of non-sap middleware in which contains the following:

Data definition, Behaviour definition, Service binding, Service definition, Class. 

 

Do I still need to declare the annotation @odata.publish: true if the Local Service Endpoint of the Service Binding is already published?

entry.title: IW36: Copying Settlement Rules in the Child Order
entry.content:
Hi,

Is it possible in the IW36 transaction, when launched by a BDC (Batch Data Communication), to copy the settlement rules from the superior order into the child order at the point when the child order hasn't been created yet? This would be done from the IF_EX_WORKORDER_UPDATE~AT_SAVE method of the BADI.

Thank you.

entry.title: Accrual object creation --mass upload program
entry.content: I have developed an ABAP program to create accrual objects. The objects are visible in transaction ACACTREE02, but the Value field is empty. How can I make the values appear in ACACTREE02 after creating the objects?

entry.title: S4HANA CDS View I_BILLINGDOCUMENTITEMCUBE to use External system in Palantir
entry.content:
Hi SAP Team,

Kindly help us How Palantir team extract the ABAP CDS View from S4HANA system.

are there any properties like allow external system?

Is there any CDS View allow authorization set up.

Kindly help on the steps, how to approach in S4HANA CDS view I_BILLINGDOCUMENTITEMCUBE

Thanks

entry.title: Vendor Basic details are not showing in FBL1N (List Display) transaction
entry.content:
Hello, 

We have upgraded our SAP support package(ECC SP Level-0031) recently, After upgrade we are facing an issue in FBL1N transaction. 

Before upgrade in FBL1N transaction vendor Basic details like Vendor Account number, Company code, Name and city are showing on Top of vendor items as mentioned in screenshot (screenshot attached) whereas after upgrade vendor details are not showing (screenshot attached).

The issue is occurring only in LIST OUTPUT whereas in GRID OUTPUT it is working correctly. Someone please help to find the root cause (any configuration or development to be done).

entry.title: Upadating VBFA Entries
entry.content: I have some mismatched entries in VBFA table where I wanted to update RFMNG_FLO field based on RFMNG. What can be a better approach of doing it?

entry.title: How to find the segment i need to map in IDOC if I have the specific field name?
entry.content: For Example.  If I know that I need to map Estimated Arrival Date then what are the next steps to find out which segment in IDOC it needs to be mapped?

entry.title: How to determine the bopf action inside a badi implementation?
entry.content:
Hi everybody,
In our dev, we create the service PO based on the freight settlement document.
Inside, we have a badi implementation. We want this implementation to be executed only during this service PO creation.
In other words, if this badi is called during any other process we want it not to be executed.

In order to do this i need to get the bopf action key which i can see in callstack and use it as a filter for the execution of the badi via hardcoding. How can i get the action key here?

Regards

entry.title: Adobe forms displayed correctly in spool but not corrected correctly.
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

The Adobe forms display correctly in preview and in the spool, but the printed output from the printer is truncated by a few centimeters on both the left and right sides. The output device in use is NL-WET-27.

 

Thanks with regards,

Vallamuthu M

I'm using HR_INFOTYPE_OPERATION to insert records in 2011, but it's inserting and also deleting a vacation record from 2001 (already paid) and adjusting it to 2006. Has anyone had this problem? Could you tell me a way to update infty 2011 without using this function?

Code: 

 

 

 

help me !!

entry.title: Implicit and Explicit enhancement
entry.content:
Hi folks,

I'm trying to better understand the practical differences between implicit and explicit enhancements in SAP. I know the basic definitions, but I’d appreciate insights based on real-world scenarios.

Thanks,

entry.title: Future of Feature Toggles
entry.content:
Dear all, 

I am currently member in a migration project to S4 Hana.
We currently use a self-developed framework that also has a "feature toggle" functionality.

When I looked into the topic of feature toggles a few years ago, I discovered that SAP has an own implementation of feature toggles in S4.

Now I wanted to test this and the result is:

  • Legacy feature toggles are marked as deprecated in Eclipse.
  • Switch-Based Feature Toggles cannot be created on customer systems.

What is the future here in on premise / private cloud?

The idea of a feature toggle is a temporary switch. As soon as the feature has been fully developed and rolled out to all users, it should be removed.
Therefore, in my opinion, there is nothing to be said against the usage of "legacy feature toggles", as they are meant only to be used temporarily in the code.

In case the framework is deleted by SAP, the legacy feature toggles should have been removed and deleted again following the idea of clean code.

At least I do not find "cl_feature_toggle"  in the current simplification database :-).

What's your opinion?
Is there a better alternative?

Regards
Jürgen

entry.title: SAP BAPI_LISTING_CONDITIONS
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a problem with this bapi, I'll explain more about my problem. I need to create a  a program Z to modify Rebate Agreements massive are in SAP, loading a excel with the fields that want to change.  With the technical specifications detailed by the functional team, this operation is carried out by transaction VBO2. In this transaction you put the agreement number(KONA-KNUMA) and check the existing conditions of this agreement number:

But the question is: Is there any procedure to extract these conditions through SAP master tables or, failing that, a BAPI that shows me the same transaction information using the agreement number?.

Can anyone help me with this problem?.

Thanks

entry.title: VL02N - Delivery Output ->Header Update using RV_MESSAGE_INSERT
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am trying update NAST for VL02N after PGI to add Delivery Output->Header to add additional Output type using ABAP.

I have added the code in program MV50AFZ1 Userexit- USEREXIT_SAVE_DOCUMENT_PREPARE.

 DATA: ls_nast   TYPE nast,
        lt_nast   TYPE TABLE OF nast,
        lv_exists TYPE abap_bool.
  TABLES : nast.
  CLEAR lv_exists.
  SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM nast
    WHERE kappl = 'V2'
      AND objky = likp-vbeln
    AND  kschl = 'ZGR1'   AND parvw = 'SP'
    AND parnr = likp-kunnr
    AND spras = 'ZH'
    .
   IF SY-SUBRC NE 0.
     LV_EXISTS = ABAP_FALSE.
   ENDIF.

    IF vbuk-wbstk ='C'.
      IF lv_exists = abap_false.
        CLEAR ls_nast.
        ls_nast-mandt = sy-mandt.
        ls_nast-kappl = 'V2'.
        ls_nast-objky = likp-vbeln.
        ls_nast-kschl = 'XYZ1'.
        ls_nast-parvw = 'SP'.
        ls_nast-parnr = likp-kunnr.
        ls_nast-spras = 'ZH'.
        ls_nast-nacha = '8'.
        ls_nast-vsztp = '4'.
        ls_nast-anzal = '1'.
        ls_nast-erdat = sy-datum.
        ls_nast-uhrvr = sy-uzeit.
        ls_nast-usnam = sy-uname.

        APPEND ls_nast TO lt_nast.
  CALL FUNCTION 'RV_MESSAGES_INSERT'
    TABLES
      tab_xnast = lt_nast.
  CALL FUNCTION 'RV_MESSAGES_UPDATE'
      EXPORTING
         msg_objky = ls_nast-objky.

   COMMIT WORK.
    ENDIF.
 ENDIF.

 XYZ1 is getting added in Delivery Output but existing output is also getting added again.
Can you please help me on this issue.

Thanks

entry.title: Is there a S/4HANA cloud test/demo/development system for partners including sample data like IDES?
entry.content:
Hi folks,

This might be a noob question, but I cannot find an answer to it on the web and reaching out to SAP about only gives me e-mail after e-mail of links that I already found myself and that do not answer my question. So, maybe the community can help!?

Here is what I am looking for: we want to get access to a cloud based SAP ERP environment that allows us to develop a ABAP report and create a transport for it (SE38, SE93, SE10, SE80, STMS, ...). To be able to develop and test the program, the system needs to be prefilled with a "meaningful" amount of data in the MM and PP area, such as material master data, business partner master data, BOMs, sales orders, invoices, purchase orders, and so on. I do not have time to create all that data in a substantial amount myself. And we do not have a SAP system for migration or a data set that we could import. I formerly had access to an on-prem R/3 installation with the IDES (internet demonstration and evaluation system) data. Basically, we are looking for something similar, but a cloud-based offering with development rights. 2 or 3 named users would be sufficient. 

So the question is, is there such an offer by SAP and if so, where can I find it. Ohh, btw, we are SAP partners, so this can also be a partner offering.

Thank you
Thomas

entry.title: Method abcd__GET_ENTITYSET is not implemented- Calling RFC FM
entry.content:
Hi ,

I am calling a RFC function module in my gateway project. My RFC Fm returns just one line of data (XML String ) in an export parameter.

I Created data model by import->RFC and in the service implementation getEntity I did Map to data Source.

Now When I execute my request

/sap/opu/odata/sap/ZSD_XXXX_XXXX_READ_SRV/InputParamSet?$format=json

 

I get 501 error saying " "value" : "Method 'INPUTPARAMSET_GET_ENTITYSET' not implemented in data provider class"

entry.title: Upload Program to Update Equipment Status in IE02 – Inconsistent Results with SHDB
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I'm working on an upload program to update the Equipment Status in transaction IE02. I initially used SHDB (Transaction Recorder) to record the update process, and while it works in some cases, it's inconsistent — sometimes the status updates successfully, and other times it doesn't.

Has anyone faced similar issues with SHDB when updating equipment status in IE02? Is there a more reliable method (BAPI, function module, or any other approach) to perform this update via a program?

I'm attaching a screenshot for reference. Any guidance or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA
entry.content:
Hi!

  Is there a Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA?

    If I needed to lock a table while the program was running, is there a command?

Thanks!

entry.title: DMEE XML File truncated after S/4HANA 2023 upgrade
entry.content:
Hi All,

We recently upgraded our system from S/4HANA 2021 to 2023.

We are noticing an issue with XML export in the FDTA transaction. When we try to download a new run, the generated XML file is truncated. Format DE_CGI_XML_CT.

For older runs (generated before the upgrade), the XML files are generated correctly also if we try to download it now.

Ca you help us, please?

Thank You

Best Regards

Alessandro
